name: Leonardo

skills.name: New York Slice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. When counterattacking, will repeat this attack against a random enemy. Will ignore 3% of the target's DEF for each buff on this Champion (stacks up to 15%).

effects.notes: Hits 2 times. Scales with 1.7 DEF per hit.
When counterattacking, repeats the 2-hit attack against a random enemy (4 total hits on counterattack).
Ignores 3% of target's DEF per buff on Leonardo (max 15% DEF ignore at 5 buffs). Synergizes with A2 which places 2 buffs on self.

skills.book_value: Medium priority. +20% damage at max books. A1 books are generally lower priority than cooldown reduction on A2/A3.
skills.notes: Excellent counterattack skill due to repeat mechanic. With A2's Unkillable+Counterattack, Leonardo can output massive damage safely. DEF ignore scales with buffs, making him stronger in buff-heavy teams. Fully booked: +5%/+5%/+10% damage.

skills.name: Shell Yeah!
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns, and a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Also places an [Unkillable] buff and a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 60% Increase DEF on all allies for 2 turns.
50% Ally Protection on all allies except Leonardo for 2 turns. Leonardo absorbs damage for the team.
Unkillable buff on Leonardo for 2 turns. CRITICAL for Clan Boss cheese teams.
Counterattack buff on Leonardo for 2 turns. Synergizes with A1 for massive damage output.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST PRIORITY. -2 turns cooldown (5→3 turns). This is Leonardo's core skill enabling both protection and damage.
skills.notes: THE CORNERSTONE of Leonardo's kit. Enables safe Clan Boss cheese teams (Unkillable rotation every 3 turns when booked), massive counterattack damage, and team protection via Ally Protection + Inc DEF. Must be fully booked for optimal performance.

skills.name: Turtles Together
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. The damage inflicted by this skill increases by 5% for each buff on all allies and enemies. Removes all buffs from all enemies if this attack kills an enemy. This effect cannot be resisted. Unity bonuses: 1 Turtle ally = ignore 15% DEF per Turtle (not counting Leonardo). 2 Turtle allies = damage scales with missing HP. 3 Turtle allies = activates when ally drops below 50% HP.

effects.notes: AOE attack scaling with 3.4 DEF. Base damage multiplier.
+5% damage per buff on ALL allies and enemies. Scales dramatically in buff-heavy teams (Clan Boss, Doom Tower).
Strips ALL buffs from all enemies if this attack kills an enemy. Cannot be resisted. Excellent for Arena and wave clear.
Unity 1 Turtle: Ignores 15% DEF per Turtle ally (not counting Leonardo). With Michelangelo = 15% ignore, with Mich+Raph = 30%, etc.
Unity 2 Turtles: Damage scales with Leonardo's missing HP. Clutch comeback mechanic.
Unity 3 Turtles: Auto-activates when ally HP drops below 50%. Occurs once per skill cooldown. Ultimate safety net.

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY. +30% damage and -1 turn cooldown (4→3 turns). Critical for damage output.
skills.notes: Devastating AOE nuke that scales with buffs. In Clan Boss with full team buffs (10+ buffs), can deal 50%+ extra damage. Unity bonuses make this insane with other Turtles. With Michelangelo: 15% DEF ignore + potential auto-trigger. Fully booked: +10%/+10%/+10%/-1 CD.

skills.name: Hero in a Half Shell
skills.description: Places a [Stone Skin] buff on this Champion for 1 turn each time this Champion's HP drops below 50%. Occurs once per skill. Whenever Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, or Raphael attacks, this Champion will join in that attack.

effects.notes: Stoneskin buff for 1 turn when HP drops below 50%. Occurs once per enemy skill. Extra survivability layer.
Ally Join Attack: Leonardo joins whenever Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, or Raphael attacks. MASSIVE damage synergy with Michelangelo (multi-hit A1) in Clan Boss.

skills.notes: Exceptional passive for Turtle teams. With Michelangelo's A1 (3 hits), Leonardo joins for additional damage. In Clan Boss, this can add 20-30% extra damage when paired with other Turtles. Stoneskin proc provides clutch survivability when low HP.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Leonardo has GOOD AI. Prioritizes A3 when off cooldown, uses A2 appropriately for team protection. No major issues for auto-play in Clan Boss or dungeons.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Leonardo's A2 provides Unkillable buff for 2 turns with 3-turn cooldown when fully booked. This enables SAFE unkillable Clan Boss teams when speed-tuned correctly (typically 171-191 SPD range). Pair with other Turtles for Unity bonuses and massive damage. Can also enable cheese strategies in Doom Tower and Faction Wars by cycling Unkillable + Counterattack for safe sustained damage.

mechanics_advisory: Leonardo is a PREMIUM Clan Boss champion with Unkillable + Counterattack on a 3-turn cycle. Unity bonuses make him EXCEPTIONAL when paired with Michelangelo, Raphael, or Donatello. Void affinity ensures safety on all affinities. DEF-scaling damage means he can build full tank stats while still nuking. A3 scales with buffs (5% per buff), making him ideal for buff-heavy content. Passive Ally Join Attack with other Turtles can add 20-30% extra damage. CRITICAL: Must be fully booked (especially A2 and A3) for optimal performance. Speed tune for Clan Boss unkillable comps (171-191 SPD recommended).
